bibl.title: The Barges of the Komanos Family.
bibl.note: Continued from: Des bateaux de Diospolis Mikra? À propos de S.B. VI, 9367 vii et viii, Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 243-253. - The status of the barges and the persons involved.
